parameters.pythonCode:
data = _input.all()
response = [{  
  "id":i.get("json").get("id",""),
  "title":i.get("json").get("title",""),
  "description": i.get("json").get("description",""),
  "technologies": i.get("json").get("technologies","").replace('[','').replace('\"','').replace(']','').split(','),
  "image": i.get("json").get("image",""),
  "demo_url": i.get("json").get("demo_url",""),
  "github_url": i.get("json").get("github_url",""),
  "featured": i.get("json").get("featured",""),
  "created_at": i.get("json").get("created_at","")
} for i in data]
return response

import uuid
from datetime import datetime

data = _input.all()[0].json.body
title =data.title
skills =data.skills
dataArray = [{
  "id": str(uuid.uuid4()),
  "title":title,
  "skill_name":i.name,
  "skill_level":i.level,
  "created_at": datetime.now().isoformat(),
  "updated_at": ""
} for i in skills]
return dataArray

parameters.content:
## Raw body: Create
title ="",	description="",	technologies=["A","B"],	image="",	demo_url="#",	github_url="#",	featured=true/false

## Raw body: Create
```json
{
    "title": "AI ML Engineer",
    "company": "VSky Solutions Pvt Ltd",
    "location": "Kudal, Maharashtra, India",
    "period": "May 2023 - Present",
    "type": "Full-time",
    "description": "Delivering AI-powered solutions across enterprise systems, enhancing automation, intelligent document processing, chatbot development, and ML model deployment at scale.",
    "achievements": [
    "Built a custom OCR pipeline for invoice processing, increasing accuracy by 92% and reducing turnaround time by 60%",
    "Developed AI-driven Microsoft Teams chatbot that automated 80% of ERP job creation workflows using NLP and RAG",
    "Integrated NetSuite & QuickBooks APIs with ASP.NET Core and MSSQL to automate financial data reporting",
    "Deployed scalable ML services on Azure with GitHub CI/CD, achieving 99.9% uptime and 70% reduction in deployment time",
    "Created a Python MVC framework with built-in ML model support, improving development speed by 40%"
    ],
    "technologies": [
    "Python", "Machine Learning", "OCR", "TensorFlow", "Keras", "Scikit-learn", 
    "Azure", "FastAPI", "GitHub Actions", "SQL", "n8n", "LangChain", "Microsoft Teams"
    ]
}
```

parameters.pythonCode:
import uuid
from datetime import datetime

data = [x.json.body for x in _('POST: /create-experience').all()]
if not data:
  return {
    "data":[]
  }
data = data[0]

# Experience Data
experience_id= _json.experience_id
timestamp = datetime.now().isoformat()
experience_data={
  "id":experience_id,
  "title":data.title,
  "company":data.company,
  "location":data.location,
  "period":data.period,
  "type":data.type,
  "description":data.description,
  "created_at":timestamp,
  "updated_at":timestamp,
  "is_active":True,
  "isExisting":_json.is_existing
}

return {
  "experience_data":experience_data,
}

import uuid
from datetime import datetime

timestamp = datetime.now().isoformat()
experience_id = _('Get Experience').first().json.experience_id
all_requested_achievements = _('POST: /create-experience').first().json.body.achievements
existing_achievements_list = [x.json for x in _('Get By Experience Id').all() if x.json != {}]

# Fix: Ensure all sort_order values are integers
existing_sort_orders = [
    int(x.get("sort_order")) if str(x.get("sort_order")).strip().isdigit() else 0
    for x in existing_achievements_list
]

max_sort_order = max(existing_sort_orders, default=-1)

# Fix: Get existing achievement strings
exist_ach_str = [x.get("achievements", "") for x in existing_achievements_list]

# Create new only list with updated sort_order
new_only = []
for i, item in enumerate([a for a in all_requested_achievements if a not in exist_ach_str]):  
  new_only.append({
      "id": str(uuid.uuid4()),
      "experience_id": experience_id,
      "sort_order": max_sort_order + i + 1,
      "achievements": item,
      "created_at": timestamp,
      "updated_at": timestamp,
      "is_active": True
  })

return new_only

import uuid
from datetime import datetime

timestamp = datetime.now().isoformat()
experience_id = _('Get Experience').first().json.experience_id
all_requested_achievements = _('POST: /create-experience').first().json.body.achievements
existing_achievements_list = [x.json for x in _('Get By Experience Id').all() if x.json != {}]

# Fix: Ensure all sort_order values are integers
existing_sort_orders = [
    int(x.get("sort_order")) if str(x.get("sort_order")).strip().isdigit() else 0
    for x in existing_achievements_list
]

max_sort_order = max(existing_sort_orders, default=-1)

# Fix: Get existing achievement strings
exist_ach_str = [x.get("achievements", "") for x in existing_achievements_list]

# Create new only list with updated sort_order
new_only = []
for i, item in enumerate([a for a in all_requested_achievements if a not in exist_ach_str]):  
  new_only.append({
      "id": str(uuid.uuid4()),
      "experience_id": experience_id,
      "sort_order": max_sort_order + i + 1,
      "achievements": item,
      "created_at": timestamp,
      "updated_at": timestamp,
      "is_active": True
  })

return new_only
